# Draft:Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort

= Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort =
Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort is a five-star lifestyle resort located in Nusa Dua, Bali, Indonesia. The property is part of the Renaissance Hotels brand under the Marriott International portfolio and officially opened in 2022. Blending Balinese cultural elements with contemporary design, the resort is positioned as an upscale lifestyle destination for both leisure and business travelers.
Overview
Situated in the heart of Nusa Dua, a renowned resort area on Bali’s southern coast, Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort features modern architecture inspired by traditional Balinese theatre and arts. The design concept reflects the island’s rich cultural heritage, combining local craftsmanship with stylish, modern aesthetics. The resort offers panoramic views and lush tropical landscapes, catering to guests who seek a lifestyle retreat.
Accommodation
The resort offers 301 guest rooms and suites, each designed with Balinese-inspired décor and contemporary touches. All rooms and suites include a private, furnished balcony or terrace with scenic views. A homage to the natural elements of the island, decorative wall ceramics adorn the walls to enhance the look of the space, with a freestanding ivory bathtub as its centerpiece.
Dining
Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort features several dining venues:
- Backstage Food Theatre – An all-day dining restaurant offering international and local cuisine in a theatrical setting.
- Tanah Liat – A specialty restaurant serving sustainably and locally caught fish, emphasizing the freshest line-caught selections.
- Lion X – A contemporary Chinese restaurant that combines modern flair with traditional Cantonese and Sichuan flavors.
- Steaksmith - A premium steakhouse serving exceptional cuts, from rich Wagyu to prime Black Angus, expertly prepared by skilled grill masters.
- Atomic 17 – A vibrant poolside bar serving cocktails and light bites.
- R Bar – The resort’s signature bar, known for handcrafted cocktails and evening entertainment.
Facilities
Facilities at Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort include:
Four thematic outdoor swimming pools, including Atomic 17 pool and jungle pool.
The Spa at Renaissance, offering Balinese-inspired treatments and wellness programs.
24-hour fitness center equipped with modern training facilities.
Event spaces and ballrooms for meetings, weddings, and private functions, accommodating up to several hundred guests.
Lava Land Kids Club, providing supervised activities and entertainment for children.

Sustainability
The resort implements eco-conscious practices in line with Marriott International’s sustainability initiatives, including energy-efficient systems, water conservation programs, and waste reduction strategies. Tanah Liat, in particular, emphasizes locally sourced ingredients and sustainable dining experiences
Ownership and Management
Renaissance Bali Nusa Dua Resort is owned by Marriott International and operates under the Renaissance Hotels brand, which is known for its contemporary design and “Discover This Way” guest experience philosophy.
Location
The resort is located approximately 20 minutes from Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) and close to major attractions such as Bali National Golf Club, Nusa Dua Beach, and Waterblow Nusa Dua.
